article.headline: Pepperdine 101, Northern Arizona 86
article.story: MALIBU, Calif. (AP) -- Marvin Lea scored 22 points and Chase Griffin had 18 to help Pepperdine to a 101-86 victory over Northern Arizona on Saturday. Lea, who had five steals, hit a lay-up to give Pepperdine a 25-point lead, 101-76, with 4:10 remaining. Tomas Pranciliaukas scored a career-high 17 points and Kingsley Costain had 15 for Pepperdine (3-9), which scored 100 points for the first time since December 2002 when the Waves beat Arkansas-Little Rock 116-110. Costain sank four 3-pointers and had six assists. Pranciliaukas hit three 3-pointers and went 6-for-6 from field and 2-for-2 from the foul line. Ruben Boykin had 19 points, Tyrone Bazy scored 15 and Josh Wilson added 13 for Northern Arizona (5-5). Gregg Barlow added 14 points for Pepperdine, which hit 18 of 22 free throws and 13 3-pointers. After losing seven of its previous eight games, the Waves avoided their worst start since the 1996-97 season, when they opened 2-10.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
